base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
        {% block header %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: Windows Updates Not Installed_By Client
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Not Installed Windows Updates

{% set filtered_items = data_sources.allFieldsWindowsUpdates|selectattr('installed', 'ne', True)|list %} {% for item in filtered_items %} {% endfor %}
Device Name Title Installed Severity
{{ item.agent__hostname if item.agent__hostname else 'N/A' }} {{ item.title if item.title else 'N/A' }} {{ item.installed if item.installed else 'False' }} {{ item.severity if item.severity else 'N/A' }}
{% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  allFieldsWindowsUpdates:
    filter:
      agent__site__client__id: '{{client.id}}'
    model: winupdate
    only:
    - id
    - agent__hostname
    - title
    - installed
    - description
    - severity
    - categories
    - category_ids
    - kb_article_ids
